column2: What information do we collect?   We collect two kinds of information: Personal information that you directly provide to us, which includes information you supply when you register an account with us.  Automatically collected, non-personal information, which includes tracking information gathered as you use TED.com.

Information gathered automatically:   We use various technologies to manage TED.com and track use of the content we provide, including: the IP address used when registering and submitting content to the site  standard web analytics information  aggregated data about email click-through rates and video viewing  information collected through HTML cookies, Flash cookies, web beacons, and similar technologies.

Statistical analysis:   We perform statistical analyses of users of the site, and their viewing and participation patterns, for product development purposes and to generally inform advertisers about the nature of our audience. Please note that we do not share contact information with our advertisers.
